hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Map Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #the Iron Boots# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Goron Mask#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #4# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Epona's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Larvae Room Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Dodongo's Cavern is much easier and faster to clear as Adult.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Light Arrows# and #Din's Fire#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Gerudo Mask#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Gerudo Mask#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.
